text: Ahmed Al Safi ( , born 1971) is an Iraqi sculptor and painter.Stephen Farthing. 501 Great Artists: A Comprehensive Guide to the Giants of the Art World, page 626, Barron's Educational Series (September 12, 2008) ==References== ==Other websites== *AlSafiArt *Saatchi Gallery *Baghdad Journal - Artnet.com Category:1971 births Category:Living people Category:Sculptors Category:Painters from Asia
title: Ahmed Al Safi
